mapper.select: SELECT admin_id, admin_pswd, admin_name, admin_mail_addr, rgst_dtm, use_yn, power_id, tel_num, hdphn_num, store_id, batch_error_sms, pswd_renew_dtm, pswd_init_yn, last_login_dtm, last_ip_addr, pswd_discord_yn, long_unused_yn, last_session_id, ctlg_app_uid FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE admin_id = #{adminId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
